descriptions.app_description: Blogger Agent helps users generate high-quality blog content effortlessly using AI, providing structure, creativity, and SEO optimization.

key_features: Provides a chat-based Interaction with the AI
Generates high-quality blog content using AI in seconds.
Allows customization of tone and writing style.
Supports keyword-based content generation for SEO optimization.
Can create full articles, outlines, or summaries based on user input.

settings.label: company_name
settings.description: Provide the name of the company/brand that the blog content should align with

settings.label: company_overview
settings.description: Provide a short overview of the company, its mission, or its core services to tailor the blog's content

settings.label: company_website
settings.description: Provide the company’s website URL to be included in the blog post conclusion.

settings.label: tone
settings.description: Choose the tone for the blog content.

settings.label: format
settings.description: Choose the format for the blog output.

settings.label: blog_generation_interval
settings.description: Select the preferred blog ideas recommendation interval
